review:
This is a really cool accessory for your expensive phone if you want to save
it from scratches and protect the screen. The kit comes complete with guide
stickers and dust stickers , wet and dry wipes and microfiber cloths.  
  
This also contains installation details, be sure to read it before
installation, moreover installation is easy and you can easily do it at home,
just ensure that you switch off the fan, as once you peel off the sticker from
the tempered glass it will attract dust. but this can be avoided if you read
and follow the instructions.  
  
The form and fit are really good and it sits neatly over the phone and the
colors also match well with the phone. The cutouts for the speaker, camera etc
are an exact fit and do not interfere with the phones cutouts.  
  
What i like  
\- The kit is complete with all the wipes, cloths, and stickers  
\- Light weight does not make the phone heavy  
\- Precision cut outs  
\- Premium look and feel

review:
Fits to an extent but it's too costly. Not worth for the money

Good fit and durable.

Does not stick completely on the edge of the screen

The edges do not paste on the screen. Gives a bad look after installing

Doesn't match the screen size of One plus X.

Size of the glass is a bit smaller than the screen.

It's brittle , cracks easily.

\------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
My Overall Opinion and User Experiences!  
\------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
  
I ordered these for my OnePlus X, and honestly they're the best ones I've ever
had. I've had matte ones, and all sorts. These actually feel really nice, and
are easy to apply. They come in a nice compressed wood box along with
auxiliary tools to help in the application.  
It's a nice touch for those who want to be as thorough as possible in getting
that perfect application of the screen, but I didn't use all of them. Even
without doing so, the screen lays on the phone easily and smoothly to where it
gets the air out towards the edges for no air pockets. The best I like about
the product is that it is, and feels like glass.  
Most smart-phones today have Gorilla Glass or some other scratch-resistant
screen. I always prefer tempered glass screen protector for my smart-phone
which protect it from scratches and screen broken. Good feeling.  
Some protectors can have that plastic-like feel to it, but this is smooth and
sturdy tempered glass. I would certainly recommend this to someone looking for
a screen protector, and what's nice is that they make more for other various
products.  
  
:.....iTs Usage.....:  
\- Its main usage is protect our smartphones display, once gets stroked, get
the new piece.  
  
:.....Tips and Tricks.....:  
\- Any uncertain strike would affect the tempered but not the stock display.  
\- While applying use all the given tools over the perfect fit.  
  
\-----------------------------------  
📥 Box Contents -  
\-----------------------------------  
  
\- A tempered glass.  
\- Applying kit.  
\- Wiping kit.  
\- Sturdy box.  
  
\-----------------------------------  
👍 Lets see the Pros?  
\-----------------------------------  
  
\- Has got an accurate curves.  
\- Cut-outs were perfect-  
\- An actual fit.  
\- Mainly suitable for OnePlus X.  
\- A quality piece.  
\- Packaging was good.  
  
\-----------------------------------  
👎 What would be the Cons?  
\-----------------------------------  
  
\- As per with the curves, I thinks the more curved at up-to 5D would be
better. But, for the price what you get is enough.  
  
\-----------------------------------  
🗨 Verdict -  
\-----------------------------------  
  
Overall I feel that this tempered glass is a sturdy product, but as of with
the curves I think it would be better as it featured with 5D technology. As of
in the quality department it stood nice over by the budget segment as well.  
  
Was my review helpful to you? Do Judge
